Abidjan: Ivory Coast's internationally recognised leader Alassane Ouattara on Monday ordered a one-month halt to exports of cocoa and coffee, a statement said. The government of the world's top cocoa producer informs economic operators of the immediate stoppage of all exports of coffee and cocoa starting Monday until February 23, the statement from his office said. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research.
